metadata.title: CVE-2021-22191 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Improper URL handling in Wireshark 3.4.0 to 3.4.3 and 3.2.0 to 3.2.11 could allow remote code execution via via packet injection or crafted capture file.

criterions.comment: wireshark package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.4.4-1ubuntu1').
